typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Key as integer,
		Name as string,
		Phone as string,
		Last_m as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceDataExtractForUpdate
source(output(
		Key as integer,
		Name as string,
		Phone as string,
		Last_m as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DestinationDataForUpdate
SourceDataExtractForUpdate, DestinationDataForUpdate exists(SourceDataExtractForUpdate@Key == DestinationDataForUpdate@Key,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DataForInsert
SourceDataExtractForUpdate, DestinationDataForUpdate exists(SourceDataExtractForUpdate@Key == DestinationDataForUpdate@Key,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsForUpdate
ExistsForUpdate alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpdate
DataForInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Key,
		Name,
		Phone,
		Last_m
	)) ~> DestinationLoadNewData
AlterRowUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Key,
		Name,
		Phone,
		Last_m
	)) ~> sinkDestination
